text: When all the commanders of the armies and their men heard that the king of Babylon had appointed Gedaliah as governor, they came to Gedaliah at Mizpahâ€”Ishmael son of Nethaniah, Johanan son of Kareah, Seraiah son of Tanhumeth the Netophathite, and Jaazaniah 25:23 Jaazaniah is a variant of Jezaniah; see Jeremiah 40:8. son of the Maacathite, as well as their men.
